channel.title: How I restart my computer back to when it was new like?
channel.description: I wanna restart my whole computer back to the beginning. A lot of things are wrong with it that I cant even fix myself too, thats why. ' by the way i dont have ths cd for it so...:(.

item.title: How I restart my computer back to when it was new like?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:13, topic:179971”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=241208.msg2045225#msg2045225 date=1202689061]
http://kubuntu.org/download.php#latest

Warning: This won’t make your computer like when it was new, it will make it better than that.
[/quote]

What’s that, the 3rd time this week?
[me=Niall]thinks mitb’s “help with operating system” senses have been tingling all week[/me][/quote]
Ban him, thanks

i have a hp laptop, on startup you press f11 and you get factory reset.

item.source: How I restart my computer back to when it was new like?

item.title: How I restart my computer back to when it was new like?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Download Windows/Mac OS/Linux burn it on a CD/DVD.

Shutdown your computer.
Start it and go in BIOS, there you change the settings to boot from CD.

Put the CD/DVD in your computer and Install the OS again.

Read full topic
